verses.verse: If thou wilt return<WH7725>, O Israel<WH3478>, saith<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068>, return<WH7725> unto me: and if thou wilt put away<WH5493> thine abominations<WH8251> out of my sight<WH6440>, then shalt thou not remove<WH5110>.

¶ My bowels<WH4578>, my bowels<WH4578>!
